title: Dominique Ick Lessont and the Dragon Knight
description: With his blood stained hands and only a small dagger for protection, Ick sets out all alone in an attempt to save his family, friends, and the love of his life from certain death. As Ick explores the world he lives in, he finds friends and allies that he never knew existed and he discovers the strength to protect those who call Lecieldo home. With his new allies, Ick stands against the dark army that threatens Ick's family and their world.This is the first book in the Dominique Ick Lessont series.Stay up to date with this series at http://www.lecieldo.com
author: Eric Tripp
